An excellent immersive old school FPS experience with good controls that requires actual strategy and a close attention span. Incredible work with nice attention to detail and for such a small development team. 8.5/10. Play it.
fun
Masterpiece.

This game really has not aged well at all, and i'm the kind of guy that loves old retro games like halo or portal 1 and 2. I get it was impressive at the time of release, but i struggled to get through the game by today's standards. It also did not help that it is not uncommon to see glitches that you will have to reset a save for. I personally had around 5-7 glitches i had to soft reset the game for during the 12 hrs i played. People site half of this games charm is the storytelling and it's not so hit on the head approach to it but i think again, portal did a 10 times better job at this.  I,m looking forward to go into the second game as that seems to have aged much better but, i would like the wipe my hands clean of this broken mess of a classic. P.S.When i finished the game and after the credits rolled it did not boot me to a menu or kick me out of the game like portal does. Is this a part of the game? i honestly can not tell if its another glitch or part of the game and i'm not going back to play the final level just to find out.

I don't know how people like this game, forced myself to play through the first couple of chapters, had to constantly consult walkthroughs as the maps are extremely confusing and don't show you where to go at all. Combat is bad, even though you're apparently supposed to not rush through everything with a shotgun (like you mostly do in Half Life 2 and it's episodes) I found that even trying to do this I would still end up as injured as I did "calculating" how to defeat enemies. Half life 2 and it's episodes are great, but Half life 1 isn't.

Это просто шедевр. Хоть игра и 1998 года, но графика до сих пор не режет глаза, а геймплей до сих пор интересен. Правда без патчей поиграть на современных компьютерах не получится. Но поверьте - время, потраченное на установку патчей стоит того. Если вы не боитесь старой графики, то попробовать однозначно стоит. Единственный минус игры - скучный финальный босс. Остальное в игре просто великолепно.

[h1] Ёклмн [/h1]
 На что я потратил 150 часов здесь!? Ах, да мультиплеер, хоть игра и старше меня, но в отличии от меня она не разваливается на части.
 Мультиплеер. если не попались дауны стреляющие гаусом в стену, то игра пройдёт очень весело. Игроки "Какие-то не разговорчивые" - ©Аликс Венс (Для тех кто в танке я имею ввиду что чатом как голосовым так и текстовым не пользуются). На серверах есть карты на любой вкус
1. Crossfire
2. Crossfire
...
999. Crossfire
[h2] Одиночка [/h2]
Говорить тут нечего так как локализации русской нет, а та что есть сделана на или/и уровне "Фаргуса". Куча интересных сюжетных линий скрытые за языковым барьером, раненый охранник в главе энергия например. Сюжетка классная, так как в ней есть
1. Атмосфера безысходности (Русским легко понять)
2. Лучшие пиу-пиу-пау-пау в истории GoldSrc (Ух. Щас Ксеры налетят)
3. Стим говорит что саундрек есть, но в игре услыщал только финальную музыку.
4. Пиджака в конце можно послать на 3 буквы.

Can't say anything against the singleplayer, it's still one of the best SP shooter campaigns around. Multiplayer really sucks though. You're going to find out that the dumbest weapons are the most powerful, so be ready to encounter idiots who are camping with crossbow from some sh*thole and you won't even know where they're doing it from, because that thing instagibs without any trace (and also can be scripted to simplify aiming and pressing two buttons into one keypress), or gauss r*tards who will be shooting literally every possible corner and wall because that way the wallgauss damage radius increases a multiple times. Gets even worse when they bind literally every weapon to exist in game to keys and then spam these in absolutely idiotic patterns like shotgun - RPG - MP nade within few ms.
Percentage of people using weapons that actually require some kind of skills like prediction, trajectory calculation, or just really good aim (examples include handgrenades, hivehand (secondary attack), satchels (no spam + blocking + camping), snarks (no brainless spam as well), RPG without laser) is close to zero. It's EXTREMELY unlikely that you'll ever find someone who really uses their thinking abilities while playing this game because nobody ever bothers when they can go "haha gauss go for 20 frags per minute". Except that's no fun, but 90% of HLDM's community is so dumb they couldn't even care
So, shortly: if you're looking for healthy strategic competition that doesn't consist of flat gauss - crossbow - shotgun pattern while all the most sweet features are rarely ever exploited, you won't find it here. Move along.
is nice
Very fun game can run on any computer.
good old times

I can appreciate this game as a mark in history, a game that changed the FPS genre forever, and as a speedrun. I CANNOT, however, appreciate it fully nowadays. It's extremely dated in more ways than one, and the gameplay itself really hasn't stood the test of time. If you're looking to play an old classic, then pick it up and give it a try. Chances are, you'll be frustrated out of your mind by the time you're almost done.
If you want the Half-Life experience without pulling your hair out over the million different ways that you can get stuck/softlocked without the save-->load feature, I recommend trying Black Mesa. It's a fan remake of the original game that's a thousand times better than the original, all-around a better experience than playing Half-Life.
Definitely play on easy for maximum enjoyment. Can be unrewarding at times. Still, fun!
the story and gameplay is god tier, and if you get bored of playing the campaign, you can always have lots of fun on deathmatch

YORE DEAD FREEMAN
Oyun oldukça güzel günümüz için oynanır mı bir fikrim yok ama bilgisayarı çok kötü olanlar alıp bitirmeyi deneyebilir.

DÜŞÜNCEM:
Half-Life oynadığım en iyi tek oyunculu fps oyunu.

SEBEBİ:
Half-Life oyun dünyasına adını altın harflerle yazdırmasının sebebi, aşırı keyifli mekanikleri ve kesinlikle harika aksiyon kurgusu gibi etmenler. 23 yıl geçti oynanır mı bu oyun demeyin. Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War'a bin basar.

PUANIM:
10/9
